Package samuel.hintersteiner.timeaftertime

Class App

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • samuel.hintersteiner.timeaftertime.App
  • public class App
extends javafx.application.Application
    App is the base class where the application starts. It contains all of the general components, static methods and the logger functionality.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Hintersteiner Samuel
